data.name: Mordo
data.description: A powerful sorcerer who weakens his enemies with forbidden magic.

starItems.name: Mordo
starItems.description: A powerful sorcerer who weakens his enemies with forbidden magic.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to target

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply negative effect to primary target

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to target

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to target

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to Blind increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> additional targets increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> up to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Slow</color> up to <color=#86e619>1</color> target.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> additional targets increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Slow</color> up to <color=#86e619>1</color> target.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> additional targets increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> instead of <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target

5.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Stun</color> primary target. If target is not stunned, <color=#fff568>Blind</color> target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Slow</color> up to <color=#86e619>1</color> target.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> additional targets increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

6.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Stun</color> primary target. If target is not stunned, <color=#fff568>Blind</color> target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Slow</color> up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> additional targets increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

7.description:
<color=#fff568>Stun</color> primary target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Slow</color> up to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This attack cannot be blocked.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies, the chance to <color=#fff568>Blind</color> additional targets increases to <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

1.description: Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. This attack cannot miss.

2.description: Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. This attack cannot miss.

3.description: Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. This attack cannot miss.

4.description: Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. This attack cannot miss.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description: Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This attack cannot miss.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>

6.description:
Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

This attack cannot miss.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies

7.description:
Attack all targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies:
 > Reduce Speed Bar for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

This attack cannot miss.

1.description: On Death of any Character, Heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health + On Death of a <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: On Death of <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy

2.description: On Death of any Character, Heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Death of a <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
2.nextUpgrade:
Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health on Death of <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus

3.description:
On Death of any Character, Heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Death of a <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, Heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
 > <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health on Death of any Character
On Death of a <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, heal most injured <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> + grant <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to that ally

4.description:
On Death of any Character, Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

On Death of a <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, Heal self and most injured <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to that ally.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
 > <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
Grant <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy on Death of <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>
On Death of any character, heal most injured <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color>

5.description:
On Death of any Character, Heal self and the most injured <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Death of a <color=#fff568>Mystic</color>, Heal self and most injured <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + grant <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to self and that ally.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
 > <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
